name: Rowan Reed
description:
Rowan Reed. That little visual novel I made that is about a kid searching for his missing grand-mother with the help of his best friend. There's two endings and a small music room to chill out with Goldie.

It was also the occasion to test the html based VN engine Belle http://fr33mind.github.io/Belle/.

Thanks to Freemind for the technical support. Special thanks to Dwept for the opening theme. Check out Dwept sounds here on Newgrounds at http://dwept.newgrounds.com/

Support my work on Patreon
